biotools.summary: Colour Deconvolution 2 is a plugin that implements context-based segmentation algorithms for intelligent microscopy. The Colour Deconvolution 2 ImageJ plugin implements stain unmixing with Ruifrok and Johnston’s method described.

bioschemas.name: colour deconvolution
